text: Kamar waɗanda suke a gabãninku, sun kasance mafi tsananin ƙarfi daga gare ku, kuma mafi yawan dũkiyõyi da ɗiya. Sai suka ji daɗi da rabonsu, sai kuka ji daɗi da rabonku kamar yadda waɗanda suke a gabãninku suka ji dãɗi, da rabonsu, kuma kuka kũtsa kamar kũtsãwarsu. Waɗancan ayyukansu sun ɓãci a dũniya da Lãhira, kuma waɗannan sũ ne mãsu hasãra
